spec.expr:
_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-down" AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.user) sum(fgt.duration) results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"ssl-login-fail" AND $Logsql
AND fgt.user:in(
  _stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
  AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
  AND fgt.action:"ssl-login-fail" AND $Logsql
    | top 10 (fgt.user)
    | keep fgt.user
  )
  | by (fgt.user) count() results

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote}) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-up"
| stats  count() results

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"ssl-login-fail" AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.user,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"ssl-login-fail" AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.reason,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-up" AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.user,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-up" AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.remip,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-down" AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.reason,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-up" AND $Logsql
AND fgt.user:in(
  _stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
  AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
  AND fgt.action:"tunnel-up" AND $Logsql
    | top 10 (fgt.user)
    | keep fgt.user
  )
  | by (fgt.user) count() results

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
AND fgt.action:"tunnel-stats" AND $Logsql
AND fgt.user:in(
  _stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
  AND fgt.tunneltype:in(${tunneltype:doublequote})
  AND fgt.action:"tunnel-stats" AND $Logsql
    | top 10 (fgt.user)
    | keep fgt.user
  )
  | by (fgt.user) count() results

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
